author: ALI MANSOURI
comment: Used it several times while travelling to Moscow and I must admit, Business class was perfect and rates were good, and the economy class was just fine.

author: Mitchell Bwye
comment: Very unhappy with my first experience with gett it is the beast from the east snow weather i ordered my taxi last night with plenty of notice and had to leave 20 minutes early to get to a main road where i was accessable for the taxi driver. It tells you that you need at least 10 minute warning to cancel your taxi but i was stood on the ice with my sister who also was on her way to work till 2 minutes past its due arrival time only then to get a message that there was not a taxi in our area. This is unexceptable not only are we missing an hour of our work shifts pay but we also had to pay a lot more for a last minute taxi pick up.

author: Michael Plotegher
comment: Either you have drivers or not. Don't let me know a driver would be available within 10 minutes to then tell me there is no driver available. Still a lot of work has to be made there

author: Finnthephoenix: Fired up
comment: Fantastic app. Taxi was here in less than 1 minute! And the driver David was a great guy. As I was taking my son to Great Ormond Street he offered to do it for free. I highly recommend this.

author: de x
comment: Idiotic app that do not work for most of the time, worse costumor service i had ever recived. This app's developers only intrest in your money and the drivers just want to mess with you.

author: Sanjib Paul
comment: In London bad weather all others failed.. Gett was available for rescue

author: Руслан Сабиров
comment: Промокод "GTDEOVF" дает скидку до 1500 рублей на 10 поездок. Налетайте!  Уже и в Казани появилось)

reply.author: Gett - Driven by Quality. The Best Taxi App
reply.content: Руслан, благодарим вас за высокую оценку сервиса и хороший отзыв!

author: Julian Bell
comment: Brilliant! Will always use Gett. Confirmed rides and fares. Trust me... You won't be sorry.

author: Arvid K
comment: Great to gett a Porsche for cheaper then other apps. Keep up the good marketing

author: Yashar Mojib
comment: It will be great if you can identify English speaking drivers

author: ahmed abdelfattah
comment: When you order, he gives you little price and after the ride it requires more

author: Graham McIvor
comment: Add GTPKSWI as a coupon code for new users to get you money off. Reliable, handy and great value with friendly drivers at your fingertips. Brilliant app.

reply.author: Gett - Driven by Quality. The Best Taxi App
reply.content: Thanks so much for the amazing feedback, Graham!

author: matan kochavi
comment: Easy to use, fast arrival's

author: Sandra Ribeiro
comment: Great app, great service.

author: Robert Gundersen
comment: Easy and straight forward to use.

author: Andrey Tretyakov
comment: I use it all the time. I like it.

author: Robert Adrian Huxley
comment: The application works like a dream. Highly recommended for travellers in London

author: Irfan Panjwani
comment: Better than uber at times

author: naomi Zacks
comment: Awesome! Thsnk you
very easy to use
Helpful

author: Phanatchakorn Pattanaparedee
comment: Love it

author: Mouth saif
comment: Good

author: Biniyam Asmerom
comment: Helpful

author: Jed Dye
comment: SPAM WITH UNWANTED PUSH MESSAGES.

reply.author: Gett - Driven by Quality. The Best Taxi App
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback! If you can contact us via email: customercare.uk@gett.com we would like to investigate your experience further to provide a more personalised response. We appreciate every comment and work across operations and product to continually improve your experience.

author: Yaron Budowski
comment: Most times doesn't find taxis or takes many minutes to find one. That's because drivers can see where you're going and can decide not to take you if it's not far away enough (unlike other ride sharing apps)

author: Gary McEwan
comment: Drivers in Glasgow frequently ignore requests in the East End of the city. When a driver does accept and is over 5 minutes away, he driver then calls and asks me to cancel because the fare is less than they are prepared to travel for. Customer Service is non existent. Their fixed fares in Glasgow are a lot more expensive then if you pay by the meter. They say they don't surge prices bit if their fixed fares are anything to go by, they quite clearly do.

reply.author: Gett - Driven by Quality. The Best Taxi App
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback! If you can contact us via email: customercare.uk@gett.com we would like to investigate your experience further to provide a more personalised response. We appreciate every comment and work across operations and product to continually improve your experience.

author: Nadav Har'El
comment: Excellent, convenient and fast way to get a taxi, where available.

author: Игорь Забавнов
comment: Промокод на первые 10 поездок - GTIAWVI

author: Nick Klyopov
comment: Очень радует адекватность водителей!

author: Kisanet Tecle
comment: Very handy and efficient

reply.author: Gett - Driven by Quality. The Best Taxi App

author: Kieran Raza
comment: I've had nothing but good experiences with Gett in Coventry. The fares are cheaper than Uber and I've barely had to wait very long for a car. What I would say though is occasionally the provided fixed fair is about a pound or so more than what the actual cost would be paying by metre, so keep that in mind

reply.author: Gett - Driven by Quality. The Best Taxi App
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback Kieran! We appreciate every comment and work across operations and product to continually improve your experience.

author: ishay barlev
comment: So easy to use to many features which are well thought into, such as the ability to call the driver (and vice versa) from within the app. Love it.

reply.author: Gett - Driven by Quality. The Best Taxi App

author: Shawn McFarlane
comment: I love the fact that I can use a credit card for payment since most Taxi' s don't.   Makes business travel 100% easier.

reply.author: Gett - Driven by Quality. The Best Taxi App

author: Georgina Bwye
comment: Incorrectly sold promotion I was told it was free for 15 pound value then they took the money from my account. I spoke to them about my negative experience and they didn't act on it at all. Very poor service.

reply.author: Gett - Driven by Quality. The Best Taxi App

author: Igor Alov
comment: You will waste your time with gett. Better use another taxi service.

author: Tamir Carmeli
comment: Useless on busy hours. Drivers may choose to not picking rides as they please.
